USER_ENO = #{USER_ENO}
DEVC_UNO NOT IN (SELECT DEVC_UNO FROM BR_DEVC_MAPP)
AND DEVC_UNO NOT IN (SELECT DEVC_UNO FROM BR_DEVC_MAPP)
SELECT MFBIZ_ID , MFBIZ_NM FROM MFBIZ_INFO WHERE USE_YN = 'Y'

SELECT ( SELECT MFBIZ_NM FROM MFBIZ_INFO WHERE MFBIZ_ID = ( SELECT MFBIZ_ID FROM DEVC_INFO DI WHERE DI.USER_ENO = #{USER_ENO} AND DI.DEVC_UNO = D.DEVC_UNO ) ) AS MFBIZ_NM , ( SELECT MODEL_ID FROM DEVC_INFO I WHERE I.USER_ENO = #{USER_ENO} AND I.DEVC_UNO = D.DEVC_UNO ) AS MODEL_ID , DEVC_UNO , DEVC_STAT , STRT_DATE , STRT_TM , ( SELECT COUNT(STRT_DATE) FROM DEVC_STAT_HIST WHERE USER_ENO = #{USER_ENO} AND DEVC_STAT_HIST.DEVC_UNO = D.DEVC_UNO ) STRT_CNT FROM DEVC_STAT D WHERE USER_ENO = #{USER_ENO}

SELECT CNTRL_USER_ID , USER_HP , USER_EMAIL , USER_ENO , CNTRL_AUTHOR , USER_PW FROM USER_INFO
SELECT MFBIZ_ID , MFBIZ_NM , MNTMNG_TEL , USE_YN , to_char(REG_DT) AS REG_DT , to_char(MDFCN_DT) AS MDFCN_DT FROM MFBIZ_INFO
SELECT MFBIZ_ID , MODEL_ID , MODEL_NM , USE_YN , TO_CHAR(REG_DT) AS REG_DT , TO_CHAR(MDFCN_DT) AS MDFCN_DT FROM MODEL_INFO

mapper.insert: MERGE INTO GOODS_CD_INFO C USING DUAL ON ( C.GOODS_CDNM = #{GOODS_CDNM} AND C.GOODS_TYPE = #{GOODS_TYPE} ) WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( C.GOODS_TYPE , C.GOODS_CD , C.GOODS_CDNM , C.USE_YN , C.REG_DT ) VALUES ( #{GOODS_TYPE} , NVL( ( SELECT MAX(GOODS_CD) FROM GOODS_CD_INFO WHERE GOODS_TYPE = #{GOODS_TYPE})+1, 001) , #{GOODS_CDNM} , 'Y' , #{REG_DT} )

INSERT INTO BR_INFO ( USER_ENO , BR_CD , BR_NM , BR_ADR , BR_ADR2 , REG_DT ) VALUES ( #{USER_ENO} , NVL( ( SELECT MAX(BR_CD) FROM BR_INFO WHERE USER_ENO = #{USER_ENO})+1, 1) , #{BR_NM} , #{BR_ADR} , #{BR_ADR2} , #{REG_DT} )
